TDR for Cross-border Shippers

End-to-End Duty Refund Solution for Cross-border Shippers

Unlock hidden savings in your international eCommerce supply chain with our specialized duty and tax recovery services.

We Integrate and Add Value to Your Supply Chain

Order Shipped

The order has left the warehouse to its international buyer.

Order Returned

The order was delivered to its US or European buyer. One or more items are returned.

Claim back US or Europe duties with our innovative TDR US Duty Drawback and TDR Europe Duty Drawback services.

Order re-imported

The order is now back, ready to be processed at the returns warehouse.
